title: 8.10 and goodbye.
body: When a game starts introducing more rng to a game that will determine who gets ahead, and nerfs a role out of contention, time to say goodbye. Push wave, invade, free half health underlevelled food incoming.

replies.body: This would of been easily fixed with a 10 min plant ward in the bushes. Simple fix. But... let's complicate it even more than it has to be.

The only RNG I can think of coming in 8.10 would be the scuttle spawn location. It spawns at 1:40, which would be around when jg finishes a botlane leash. I think you'll find it won't be RNG as much as players might need to drop a ward in botside river at around 1:20 to see where it spawns.
See scuttler - it's botside
Don't see scuttle - it's topside

As a jg player, I can't say I like that they're effectively nerfing jungling. Whether it's good for the overall game, who can say right now, but I can see where they're trying to go - one of the big complaints especially toplaners tend to have is the jg's impact on the lane. They're basically trying to make toplane more playable.
